* @param {any} params.event

*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     var value  = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric1.output.result[0].value;
    if(value>20){
        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric1ShowRed',false); //Show component
    }
    else{
        api.setState('tab3verticalAMetric1ShowRed',true);
    }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-07 12:49:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>effc5d9c1b4ff15064122144b24bcb88</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tab3showVerticalAMetric1Red</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_effc5d9c1b4ff15064122144b24bcb88</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-08 10:03:28</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>18c445d324f0000001</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_effc5d9c1b4ff15064122144b24bcb88</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-07 13:00:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>b86f59941b8ff15064122144b24bcb43</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-07 13:00:07</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
